DOC.brief_title: Intracoronary Bradykinin Mediated t-PA Release Heart Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Heart transplant recipient undergo annual cardiac catheterization participate protocol : Characterization brachial arterial tPA release , vasodilator function , vascular compliance correlation fibrinolytic balance , oxidative stress , inflammation measure heart transplant recipient ( SCCOR Project 1 , Aim 3C ) . ( IRB # 070517 ) 2 . 25 Subjects transplant vasculopathy 25 subject free transplant vasculopathy , document previous angiogram . 3 . Otherwise healthy Exclusion criterion : 1 . PVC < 30 2 . Hypertensive subject ACE inhibitor 3 . Pregnant nursing mother 4 . Diabetic HbA1C > 7.5 stigma end organ damage ( neuropathy , retinopathy , nephropathy , cardiomyopathy ) 5 . Cholesterol > 30 mg/dL NCEP accept level base cardiac risk . 6 . Triglycerides > 200 7 . Previously diagnose obstructive coronary artery disease 8 . Renal insufficiency ( Creatinine ≥ 1.5 mg/dl ) 9 . History cerebrovascular disease 10 . Any chronic inflammatory disease ( rheumatologic , inflammatory bowel disease , etc ) 11 . Uncontrolled Stage 2 Hypertension ( 160/100 mmHg ) , end organ damage due hypertension ( left ventricular hypertrophy , atrial fibrillation , hematuria , renal insufficiency , prior cerebrovascular disease ) . 12 . Angiotensin convert enzyme inhibitor use 13 . Coagulopathy ( INR ≥ 1.5 , PTT ≥ 150 % control ) 14 . Peripheral Vascular Disease 15 . Other chronic medical illness discretion investigator Healthy control enrolled SCCOR Project 1 , Aims 3A 3B ( IRB # 030473 061160 ) participate IRB number .
